original_text: When they had gone some distance from Micah’s house, the men who lived near Micah were called together and overtook the Danites.
korean_text: 그들이 미가의 집을 멀리 떠난 때에 미가의 이웃집 사람들이 모여서 단 자손을 따라 붙어서

sentences.original_text: When they had gone some distance
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 어느 정도 거리를 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: the men who lived near Micah
